subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Hammon, 37, the former Liberty player who is retiring after a 16-season playing career in the W.N.B.A., spent much of last season in an unofficial capacity with the Spurs.
snippet: Hammon, 37, the former Liberty player who is retiring after a 16-season playing career in the W.N.B.A., spent much of last season in an unofficial capacity with the Spurs.
